# Null hypothesis statistical significance testing

Neyman-Pearson Paradigm

## $H_0$ and $H_A$

<table style="width:100%; border: none;">
  
<tr><td>

$H_0$

* Skeptical point of view
* No effect
* No preference
* No Correlation
* No difference

</td><td>

$H_A$

* Refute Skepticism
* Effect
* Preference
* Correlation
* Difference

</td></tr></table>
